@hadefication @Netlify The limit on the free tier is 15 minutes. Usually that is plenty unless your site is very large or complex. You can: - Look for failing or lingering processes in your build (this can help: https://t.co/ryDcqdTux2) - Contact us to talk quotas/tiers I bet optimisations will win.
